name: Gundam Battle Operating Simulator
overview:
A mecha battle simulator from Banpresto based on the popular anime Mobile Suit Gundam.

Players control the mobile suit using the two levers. The machine also has a lever which is used for making small jumps, with larger jumps able to be executed by pressing the pedal and moving the joysticks at the same time. The mobile suit has multiple attacks and different weaponry to use. The trigger on the right joystick is for the beam rifle, whilst the thumb button activates the vulcans. The trigger on the left joystick is for the beam saber, with the thumb button used to guard.
